channel.title: Help badly!
channel.description: How do you run a server? I got the source from a friend but i don't know how to run it HELP! I can login by myself but people can't connect to my IP. i have the runserver.bat.

item.title: Help badly!
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

It probably came with a batch file called runserver.bat. If not, just create a file called “run.bat” in Notepad (or another text editor) like this:

@echo off
java server
pause
exit

Read full topic
